Title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Musical, Sci-Fi
Director: Robert Hughes, Dan Povenmire, Jay Lender, Jeff 'Swampy' Marsh, Kyle Menke
Writer: Jon Colton Barry, Dan Povenmire, Jeff 'Swampy' Marsh, Michael Diederich (additional material), Wendy Grieb (additional material), Chris Headrick (additional material), Seth Kearsley (additional material), Kyle Menke (additional material), Tom Minton (additional material), Zac Moncrief (additional material), Sue Perrotto (additional material), Bernie Petterson (additional material), Joe Orrantia (additional material), Aliki Theofilopoulos (additional material), Chong Lee (additional material), Kaz (additional material), Antoine Guilbaud (additional material), Kim Roberson (additional material)
Actors: Vincent Martella, Ashley Tisdale, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Caroline Rhea
Plot: Perry's worst fear comes true when Phineas and Ferb find out that he is in fact Secret Agent P, but that soon pales in comparison during a trip to the 2nd dimension where Perry finds out that Dr. Doofenshmirtz is truly evil and successful.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
